article.headline: These money and investing tips can help you build a portfolio that can stand the test of time
article.body: Don’t miss these top money and investing features: Don’t just default to the S&P 500: Consider this simple four-fund portfolio Warren Buffett knows these are the best investors to follow with your own money Why S&P 500 returns could be flat until 2030 unless you reinvest dividends You have ample savings. So why are you scared of running out of money? Who will win the presidential election? Look at stock markets for clues These money and investing stories, popular with MarketWatch readers over the past week, offer advice and insights about how to be a patient, prudent buyer who is comfortable holding stocks and other assets for the long-term — making course corrections as needed.
